amendment.description: To allow for a reasonable 5-year phase-in period for adjusted premiums.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4723 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 69. Record Vote Number: 119.

action.text: Amendment SA 4723 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3855-3856, S3879; text: CR S3855) To allow for a reasonable 5-year phase-in period for adjusted premiums.
